CustomField.description: Determines if this paycode is Pay Only, Bill Only, or Pay & Bill
CustomField.label: Pay/Bill Type

value.description: Transactions with this paycode should NOT be invoiced but should be included in payroll export
value.label: Pay Only

value.description: Transactions with this paycode should NOT be paid but should be included in invoice
value.label: Bill Only

value.description: Should expect to both pay and bill this transaction
value.label: Pay & Bill
